title: Kathirundhu Kathirundhu Lyrics Vaidhegi Kaathirundhaal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
nethu vara serthuvacha
aasaigal vegudhadi
nee irundhu naan anacha
nimmadhiyaagumadi

mukkulichi naanedutha
muththu sirpi neethane
mutheduthu nenjukulla
pathirama vecheney

naan padikkum moganamey
naan padaicha seethanamey
thaen vadicha paathiramey
thenmadhura poocharamey

neeru nilam naalu pakka
naan thirumbi paarthaalum
andha pakkam indha pakkam
aththanayum neeyaagum

aalayitta sengarumba
aattugira emmanasa
yaara vittu dhoodhusolli
naanraivan un manasa

nethu vara serthuvacha
aasaigal vegudhadi
nee irundhu naan anacha
nimmadhiyaagumadi
